name: Survival Ball
description: Single or Local Co-Op physics-based game with six distinct stages developing a simple premise: As the decaying world challenges you, don't fall!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support, e.g. Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz (or equivalent processor) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
